site.name: Triton Framework
site.description: Official documentation for the Triton Framework â€” module loading, class protection, and the Triton desktop runtime.

docs.title: CentralModuleOpener
docs.description: Central dispatch point for opening any loadable item in the Triton desktop. Handles on-the-fly Java compilation, JAR launching, native execution, and graceful fallback. Includes inner classes ModuleData and ModuleFirstClassLoader.

docs.title: ModProtection
docs.description: Runtime annotation controlling whether a framework class can be overridden by module mod/ files. Supports ALLOW_MOD (silent), DISALLOW_MOD (blocked), and an implicit default that notifies the user.
